meta.title: Community Celebrations Live
meta.description: Your colourful hub for live events, story moments, and community surprises across Doncaster.

banner.alt: Community celebrations banner with pastel confetti

welcome.title: Community Celebrations Hub
welcome.subtitle: Drop into the hub, plan your day, and discover the key moments we have lined up.

cards.title: Event hub opens
cards.body: Collect your wristband, grab a welcome drink, and meet the celebrations team.

cards.title: Trading Post & market
cards.body: Swap stickers, pins, and postcards while catching featured spawns around the market.

cards.title: Closing ceremony
cards.body: Gather by the main stage for the big wrap-up, shout-outs, and prize reveals.

cards.title: After-hours social
cards.body: RSVP to keep the celebrations going with food, music, and late-night vibes.

route_tours.heading: Route tours
route_tours.description: Join guided walks that uncover Doncaster lore, raid hotspots, and hidden challenges. Arrive five minutes early at the welcome arch to secure your spot.

story.title: Story brief
story.body: A mysterious energy is rippling through Doncaster. The Fairy Council needs allies, but Team NO Wild have their own plans.
story.alt: Illustration of Team NO Wild characters

mission.title: Your mission
mission.body: Choose your path, complete featured activities, and collect stamps to unlock celebratory rewards.

activities.prizes_intro: You can earn up to two prizes today.

rewards.title: Earn 4 stamps
rewards.description: Play through the headline activities to claim an exclusive celebrations patch.
rewards.info: Stamp cards available from the welcome desk.

rewards.title: Complete the geocache
rewards.description: Crack the riddles around town to unlock the holographic postcard set.
rewards.info: Check in with the Fairy Council booth for your first clue.

prizes_showcase.heading: Prizes include…
prizes_showcase.caption: Collect prizes at the Community Desk beside the Corn Exchange entrance.

map.heading: Map & logistics
map.body: Drop a static map, Google My Maps embed, or quick directions here. Use this placeholder to plan the layout.
notes: Registration: Welcome arch beside Corn Exchange
Rest zones: Corn Exchange mezzanine & Elmfield Park

more.heading: More to explore
more.body: Use this space for FAQ links, volunteer sign-ups, accessibility info, or anything else you need on the day.
